availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John W. Reynolds (Webster/ Hopkins County, Ky, student )

body.p: Webster County and Hopkins County, Kentucky, student. Kentucky native. Son of Sebron Reynolds. Married to Mary Ellen Prather Reynolds in Webster County, Kentucky, on December 24, 1863. Father of Warren Reynolds. Student in Hopkins County in 1850. Student in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 148A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 481.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 3, p. 217B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Webster County Marriages, Film #000568132, p. 378-9.
"J W Reynolds (1835-1889)," Find A Grave, Memorial #93108089, accessed November 24, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93108089.
